description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has decided to run two operations in parallel producing his new battery for a certain period, and then, and only then, choose between them. It's a new approach to the bidding process, and it sounds expensive. Plus, after a good 40-year run, the minibar is finally being phased out of hotels. Why are hotels taking our midnight pleasures away? And what are they replacing them with?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday May 2, 2014
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday May 2, 2014
byline: Sabri Ben-Achour, D Gorenstein, Mitchell Hartman, Jeff Tyler, Shea Huffman and David Brancaccio
